author: nflaig
content:
I guess that part is off the spec, we have those EL states
```
export enum ExecutionEngineState {
  ONLINE = "ONLINE",
  OFFLINE = "OFFLINE",
  SYNCING = "SYNCING",
  SYNCED = "SYNCED",
  AUTH_FAILED = "AUTH_FAILED",
}
```

author: nflaig
content: and `OFFLINE` is the only state that will report as `el_offline: true`

author: nflaig
content: iirc it was the lighthouse team that first used this, as per https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/pull/4295 error or 401 due restricted access seems to be used to set `el_offline: true`, although calling `newPayload` on syncing EL should not return an error?
